I developed a tool for the recycler to put into the middle slot.
It consists of two spiked cylinders which rip the target unit into shreds. This process is versatile, but sports a somewhat low yield.

This tool features many recipes, for example: 
 -All products of the Assembly Table 
 -Stones 
 -Plants, wood, foliage 
 -Glass und wool 
 -Bones
